about_the_game:
Music Production:

Music By: Two Feathers
Composers: Elvira Björkman & Nicklas Hjertberg

Mix & Master by:
Chris Elms
Orchestrator: Jason Poss

Performances:
Vocals (Song: “Endless”): Emi Evans
Strings: Timothy Loo (Cello), Luke Maurer (Viola), Alyssa Park (Violin), Shalini Vijayan (Violin).
Koto: Akemi Yamada
Woodwinds & Reeds: Krisin Naigus (Field of Reeds)
Percussion: Roger Bergström.

Recording Engineers:
Phil Levine, Takehiko Naito

Copyists and Coordinators:
Takaaki Nakagawa (Koto Copyist), Yoshiyuki Suzuki (Koto Coordinator), Jason Poss (Strings Copyist), Timothy Hanson (Strings Copyist).

Recorded at:
Igloo Music (Strings), ODEN STUDIO Studio A (Koto), Two Feathers Studio (Misc).
USA musicians are members of The American Federation of Musicians (AFM).
